text: K. Ramachandra Babu (15 December 1947 â€“ 21 December 2019) was an Indian award- winning cinematographer of over 125 movies. Babu was born in Maduranthakam, Tamil Nadu, India. His best known works were Dweepu, Chamaram and Oru Vadakkan Veeragatha. Babu died on 21 December 2019 of a heart attack at the age of 72. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Official website of Indian Society of Cinematographers * Category:1947 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Indian cinematographers
title: Ramachandra Babu
